quoteText: TERMINATION FOR BREACH: Vimeo may suspend, disable, or delete your account (or any part thereof) or block or remove any content you submitted if Vimeo determines that you have violated any provision of this Agreement or that your conduct or content would tend to damage Vimeo's reputation and goodwill.
title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

tosdr.case: The service can suspend your account for several reasons
